    sdam

    Digital tools for the SDAM project at Aarhus University

    This package provides digital tools for the Social Dynamics and complexity in the Ancient Mediterranean (SDAM) project at Aarhus University.


    Install

    ## Install package
devtools::install_github("mplex/cedhar", subdir="pkg/sdam")

    or

    devtools::install_github("sdam-au/sdam")

    Usage

    ## Load package
library("sdam")
    ## Load epigraphic data
data("EDH")
    ## Look at it
str(EDH)
